content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('STG_ActivityData', 'U') IS NOT NULL
    DROP TABLE STG_ActivityData;

CREATE TABLE STG_ActivityData (
	[SYMBOL] VARCHAR(50)
	,[SERIES] CHAR(10)
	,[DATE] VARCHAR(15)
	,[PREV_CLOSE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[OPEN_PRICE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[HIGH_PRICE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[LOW_PRICE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[LAST_PRICE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[CLOSE_PRICE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[AVG_PRICE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[TTL_TRD_QNTY] BIGINT
	,[TURNOVER_LACS] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[NO_OF_TRADES] BIGINT
	,[DELIV_QTY] BIGINT
	,[DELIV_PER] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[FileName] VARCHAR(50)
	);
